body:
I've been playing this server for quite a while and still been wondering who were the first people to join the server? (first people as in first 5-10 or so).  I just thought it would be interesting to know!  And for those who don't know i mean way back when the server was still mczone. Thanks.


                       - Critz :)

replies.body:
Kylo (formerly known as funky) was the first to join.
Blackhawk was the second to join.
ParaPenguin was the third to join (I believe).
ParaPhoenix may have been the fourth.

replies.body: In your profile, or someone elses, go to where it says "info". Then go to where it says "joined". Right below that it will say how long ago (1 year ago, ect). Hover over that and it will tell you the exact date that player joined.
replies.body_tagged: In your profile, or someone elses, go to where it says "info". Then go to where it says "joined". Right below that it will say how long ago (1 year ago, ect). Hover over that and it will tell you the exact date that player joined.
